item.description: We have decided to read what Marcuse says about Hegel. We decided to read the first 4 chapters of Part I of Reason and Revolution (about 120 pages). Part I is called The Foundations of Hegel's Philosophy and the chapters are: Introduction, Hegel's Early Theological Writings, Towards the System of Philosophy, Hegel's First System and The Phenomenology of Mind.
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask for the philosophy group from the stuff.
item.name: Herbert Marcuse: Reason and Revolution : Hegel and the Rise of Social Theory
